description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for Kong Gateway using OTLP metrics from the Kong OpenTelemetry plugin. Tracks request throughput, latency percentiles, error rates, connection states, traffic volume, plugin performance, and resource usage.
name: kong-gateway
title: Kong Gateway Monitoring

fcde53b2-6959-44a1-b481-bbc4fb1039bd.name: deployment.environment
fcde53b2-6959-44a1-b481-bbc4fb1039bd.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment.environment') AS `deployment.environment`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'kong.request.count'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `deployment.environment`
ORDER BY `deployment.environment` ASC

7dca3c9e-f863-4f6e-99f5-4ba82e8db9cb.name: service.name
7dca3c9e-f863-4f6e-99f5-4ba82e8db9cb.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'service.name') AS `service.name`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'kong.request.count'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `service.name`
ORDER BY `service.name` ASC

bf1df6d2-8fd3-4ca6-ba08-9da89dc5dfdb.name: namespace
bf1df6d2-8fd3-4ca6-ba08-9da89dc5dfdb.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'namespace') AS `namespace`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'kong.request.count'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `namespace`
ORDER BY `namespace` ASC

c3452e47-6d01-4f37-9d7f-d86f35b03442.name: cluster
c3452e47-6d01-4f37-9d7f-d86f35b03442.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'cluster') AS `cluster`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'kong.request.count'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `cluster`
ORDER BY `cluster` ASC
